content: Hello! Thank you for contacting XYZ Home Services. My name is AI Receptionist. May I have your name, please?
Thanks, John! Could you please provide the address where the electrical service is needed?
Thank you for the address. Let me check if we're able to provide service in your area.
Great news, John! We do provide electrical services in your area. When would be an ideal time for our technician to visit?
I’m considering a few companies for quotes before deciding when to schedule.

I understand, John. It's always good to review your options. If you have any questions or decide to schedule with us, feel free to reach out anytime. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?
No, thanks. I’ll be in touch if I decide to proceed.
reason: Customer wants to get quotes from other companies first.
